s2.title: CreateDOMDocument
s2.p: CreateDOMDocument, illustrates how you can create a DOM tree in memory from scratch. It then reports the elements in the tree that was just created.

s3.title: Running CreateDOMDocument
s3.p: The CreateDOMDocument sample illustrates how you can create a DOM tree in memory from scratch. To run CreateDOMDocument, enter the following
Here is a sample output from CreateDOMDocument
s3.source: CreateDOMDocument The tree just created contains: 4 elements.
